snippet.title: Clock Tower Rewind - Official Release Date Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Clock Tower Rewind gets a new trailer showcasing gameplay and a release date for this revival of the original survival horror, point-and-click, side-scrolling adventure game. Clock Tower: Rewind releases on Nintendo Switch, Xbox, PS4 (PlayStation 4), PS5 (PlayStation 5), and PC via Steam on October 29, 2024.
